title: White Sands National Monument: Education
body: A Living Laboratory Why a laboratory? Because new discoveries are being made here all the time! From our unique wildlife to our fascinating geology, there are many opportunites for your students to learn. You are welcome to bring your class to the park or check out our loan materials and ready-made lesson plans. Visit our Frequently Asked Questions page for more information.                 Field Trips Make White Sands National Monument your next educational field trip! Read More        Invite a Ranger to Class Would you like a ranger to come to your classroom? Contact us to arrange for an in-class presentation. Read More        Traveling Trunks When a field trip to the dunes is not an option, think about reserving one of our Teacher Resource Trunks. Read More
